cards.definition: v.  to make known something private or secret
adj.  marked by or resulting from carelessness negligent
n.  a formal eulogistic composition
adj.  exceedingly harsh or very severe
cards.translation: بسیار ظالمانه، بسیار ستمگر(انه)،قوانی حقو یق سخت و ب رحمانه

cards.definition: n.  a mixture of different things
adj.  impossible to dispute
adj.  not partial or biased
adj.  prevalent in or limited to a particular locality region or people
adj.  very small and tiny
adj.  producing wealth
v.  to offset an error defect or undesired effect
adj.  moving from topic to topic without order rambling
v.  to require as an antecedent in logic or fact
cards.translation: در برداشتن، متضمن بودن، پیش پنداشتن، از پیش فرض کردن
cards.synonym: presume, assume, imply, posit, postulate, take as read, take for granted

cards.definition: adj.  acting as a mediator
derogate
cards.translation: باعث کوچک دیده و فرض شدن

cards.definition: adj.  often trying to control the behavior of other people in an annoying or unwanted way
cards.translation: مغرور ، از خود راضی ، منکوب گر
cards.synonym: arrogant, dictatorial, domineering, haughty, high-handed, imperious, supercilious, superior

cards.definition: adj.  marked by fervent partisanship for a person a cause or an ideal
adj.  not important
v.  to bring forth again in another form without significant alteration
adj.  acting with indifference showing little interest or care
cards.translation: (انجام شده با بی توجهی و برای انجام وظیفه) سرسری، باری به هر جهت، با بی میلی

cards.definition: v.  to form by combining separate things
v.  to feel a desire to have what someone else has
cards.translation: حسادت کردن, چشم طمع (به چ ری یا مال دیگری)

cards.definition: adj.   in a situation which you are forced to defend or protect someone or something
adj.  not limited in any way
adj.  falsely appearing to be right
adj.  not having a goal or purpose
cards.translation: بی هدف، بی منظور، ب مقصود

cards.definition: adj.  having or showing the innocence trust and honesty characteristic of young people
cards.translation: اصیل، صاف و ساده، رک گو

cards.definition: adj.  belonging to the essential nature of a thing
adj.  sure to happen
adj.  completely unwilling to change
adj.  not influenced by emotions or personal interest
cards.translation: جدا، منفصل/ ب اعتنا، ب علاقه

cards.definition: adj.  firmly and long established deeprooted
cards.translation: سابقه دار، خوگرفته، ریشه دار، ژرف، سر سخت
cards.synonym: long-standing, chronic, confirmed, entrenched, habitual, incorrigible

cards.definition: adj.  oblique or indirect
adj.  easy and pleasant to speak to
n.  an unusual unexpected or fanciful idea
adj.  very determined to do something
cards.synonym: resolve, endurance, dogged, dour, persistent, pertinacious, unyielding

cards.definition: adj.  scornfully or cynically mocking
n.  secret or dishonest behavior or activity
adj.  being in compliance with the law
cards.translation: درست، قانو زب، م رشوع، برحق، حلال زاده، م رشوع کردن

cards.definition: v.  to reproduce or otherwise illegitimately use as ones own
cards.translation: انتحال کردن، سرقت ادب کردن، م یی دزدی کردن
